titleStmt.title: The King on his throne: or A discourse maintaining the dignity of a king, the duty of a subject, and the unlawfulnesse of rebellion. Delivered in two sermons preached in the Cathedrall Church in York. By R.M. Master in Arts, Coll. S. Pet. Cant.
titleStmt.author: Mossom, Robert, d. 1679.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
